聊.definition: (coll.) to chat; (literary) temporarily; for a while; (literary) somewhat; slightly; (literary) to depend upon

聊以.definition: to use it (or do it) for the purpose of (allaying hunger, relieving boredom etc) to some extent

聊以塞責.definition: in order to minimally fulfill one's responsibilities; in order to get off the hook

聊以自慰.definition: to find some consolation (idiom); to find relief in

聊以解悶.definition: to use it for the purpose of relieving the tedium to some extent

聊備.definition: to provide on a makeshift basis; to use temporarily as

聊備一格.definition: to use as a stopgap; to make a perfunctory gesture; token; nominal

聊城市.definition: Liaocheng, prefecture-level city in Shandong Province 山東省|山东省[Shan1dong1 Sheng3]

聊天兒.definition: erhua variant of 聊天[liao2 tian1]

聊生.definition: to earn a living (esp. with negative)

聊表寸心.definition: (of a gift) to be a small token of one's feelings

聊齋志異.definition: Strange Stories from a Chinese Studio, Qing dynasty book of tales by 蒲松齡|蒲松龄[Pu2 Song1 ling2]
